title: Exquisite Gaja Lakshmi Vaddanam - A Regal Statement Piece
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with meticulously set Polki Diamonds of VVS clarity
complemented by vibrant Burmese Rubies (4.90 carats) and Zambian Emeralds (4.82 carats).
features: Features the revered Gaja Lakshmi motif, symbolizing prosperity and abundance. Intricate floral and paisley designs crafted with exceptional attention to detail. The central emerald draws the eye, framed by a halo of shimmering diamonds. Features elephant designs, symbolizing royalty and grace.
colors: Primarily gold with accents of deep red from the rubies and rich green from the emeralds
creating a traditional and auspicious color palette.
occasions: and other significant celebrations. Can also be worn as a statement piece for high-end cultural events.
description: A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage, this Vaddanam is a timeless heirloom. The combination of traditional motifs, exquisite craftsmanship, and high-quality gemstones makes it a truly valuable investment. It seamlessly blends tradition with modern elegance, making it a showstopper at any event.
